description.value:
Requirements You are benefiting from Aldori Parry.

Trigger An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

You riposte with your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Aldori Dueling Sword]{Aldori Dueling Sword} when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike or use a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Disarm]{Disarm} action against the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.
